subject: Document shared with you: "Simsonn Pedal Issue"
description_text:
I've shared an item with you:

Simsonn Pedal Issue
https://docs.google.com/document/d/102-v2I43aGVxb7oOhcBhIl391ub-lNYL49UlVnVzHM4/edit?usp=sharing&invite=CM3bhPoO&ts=6941eb7a

It's not an attachment -- it's stored online. To open this item, just click  
the link above.

This message is sent on behalf of Joseph Vance Re: Pedal issue

conversations.body_text: Hi Valerie Vance,  Could you please let me know which ticket you previously submitted? I’ll check the issue for you. Also, please confirm whether your pedals are the Pro Plus model and if the firmware version is 1.7.1. If so, you can upgrade to the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 software to calibrate the pedals.         For Pro series control boxes: If the version is 1.7.1, you can update the firmware via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu (This method does not apply to 1.7.0 control boxes.)    For PlusX pedals: Only the plusx.sfu firmware can be used for updates.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
